oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Dog tags of Pvt. Ruby Glenn Blevins
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: A farmer from Blounty County, Pvt. Blevins served in Co. L, 117th Inf. Regt. These M-1910/M-1917A dog tags are on the original cord and are marked in accordance with regulations prior to March 1918 with name, rank and unit identification on one face and . serial number 1309495 on the other. Blevins was wounded slightly in action on September 24, 1918, and survived the war. The family reports that he refused promotion and died in 1971.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: World War, 1914-1918; World War, 1914-1918 - History
